imdb.plot outline: "Rufus Beck - the German reader of the Harry Potter audiobooks - was here in Hanover. Rufus Beck (born July 23, 1957) is a German theatre, film, and voice actor. Besides his work on stage, on film, and on television. He is also well known for his role in the comedy "Der bewegte Mann". Beck is also a well known reader of audiobooks..."
imdb.title: Rufus Beck, die deutsche Hörbuch-Stimme von Harry Potter
akas: Rufus Beck, die deutsche Hörbuch-Stimme von Harry Potter (Germany)
plot: Rufus Beck (bornJuly 23, 1957) is a German theatre, film, and voice actor. Besides his work on stage, on film, and on television, Beck is also a well known reader of the Harry Potter audiobooks. Rufus Beck was here in Hanover.::Videotrailer-INFO

"Rufus Beck - the German reader of the Harry Potter audiobooks - was here in Hanover. Rufus Beck (born July 23, 1957) is a German theatre, film, and voice actor. Besides his work on stage, on film, and on television. He is also well known for his role in the comedy "Der bewegte Mann". Beck is also a well known reader of audiobooks..."::wiki
